task.title: Delete Corpus
task.shortdesc: Delete a corpus in your project.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) on the corpus you wish to delete and choose Delete Corpus from the context menu.
step.stepresult: A dialog will appear asking you to confirm whether you would like to delete this corpus and informing you that this action cannot be undone.

step.cmd: If you are unsure, click No. To continue and delete the corpus, click Yes.
step.stepresult: The deleted corpus will no longer appear in the Project Manager window.
